prerequisite_language: Generation Language: The language in which posts will be created.

onboarding_step1_welcome: Welcome! 🎉 I am your AI assistant for managing Telegram channels. Let's get everything set up in a few simple steps.
onboarding_step2_passport: Great! The channel has been added. Step 2: Style Passport Now, let's create a 'Style Passport'. This will help me understand the tone and format of your publications. Click the button below to begin.
onboarding_skipped: Alright, you can always get back to the settings from the main menu.
add_channel_unified_prompt: Add a Channel To begin, add your channel using one of these methods: 1️⃣ Forward a post from your channel here. 2️⃣ Send a link (public or private), its username (e.g., @durov), or its ID. Reminder: You must be an administrator in the channel, and the bot must have permission to post.
invalid_channel_id_error: 🚫 Invalid format. Please send a username, ID, a full link to the channel, or forward a post.
channel_not_found_error: 🚫 Channel not found. Please make sure the data is correct and that the bot has been added to this channel.
help_command_text: 👋 Hello! I'm your AI assistant for Telegram channels. Quick Commands: /menu - Main Menu /channels - Your Channels /balance - Balance & Top-up /promo - Activate Promo Code /support - Support /help - Show this help message What I can do: 📢 Channel Management Add your channels, organize them into folders, and configure each one individually. 🎨 Style Passport You provide me with examples of your posts, and I create a 'Style Passport' that describes your Tone of Voice, topics, and structure. 🚀 Auto-Posting Scenarios Set up automatic news searches by keywords and sources (Google News, Reddit, Twitter) and have them published to your channels on a schedule.
onboarding_step3_description: Step 3: Channel Description Excellent! Now, in one or two sentences, describe what your channel is about. This will help me better understand the context and find relevant news.
onboarding_step4_language: Step 4: Generation Language Great! And the final step: specify the language in which I should write posts for this channel (e.g., `english`).
onboarding_final: 🎉 Congratulations! Your channel is fully configured and ready to go! You can now create your first auto-posting scenario to let me start helping you.
promo_not_found_or_expired: ❌ Promo code not found, inactive, or its usage limit has been reached.
promo_success: ✅ Promo code successfully activated! You have been credited with {count} generations.
